name: Eye chart
body:
![Hello World!](http://media-cache-ec4.pinimg.com/736x/2f/68/bb/2f68bba35be93efc45f402402b2a3f7f.jpg)

The idea is to take a data block and split into a auto generating eye chart.
The type of data is irrelevant (mysql, xml, txt, etc..).

The data would be slit into this pattern:
1
23
456
7890


Each line would include an auto-incremental class assignment in html for css control.

The first version will be php. I would like to collect many different language variants, as well.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
